mapper.select:
/* view010101P03.retrieveTmplatList */
SELECT TP.PRJ_ID , TMPLAT_ID , TMPLAT_DVS_CD , TMPLAT_NM , DC.CMN_CD_NM AS TMPLAT_DVS_CD_NM FROM VIEW VI , TMPLAT TP , (SELECT CMN_CD_NM, CMN_CD FROM DETAIL_CD WHERE CMN_DVS_CD = 'TMPLAT_DVS_CD') DC WHERE VI.PRJ_ID = TP.PRJ_ID AND TP.TMPLAT_DVS_CD = DC.CMN_CD AND VI.VIEW_ID = #{VIEW_ID}
